component.name: ExtrasItem
component.script:
function init() as void m.posterImg = m.top.findNode("posterImg") m.name = m.top.findNode("pLabel") m.role = m.top.findNode("subTitle") end function
sub setLabel() m.name.text = m.top.labelText end sub
sub setSubTtl() m.role.text = m.top.subTitle end sub
sub setPoster() m.posterImg.uri = m.top.posterUrl end sub
sub showContent() if m.top.itemContent <> Invalid cont = m.top.itemContent m.name.text = cont.labelText m.name.maxWidth = cont.imageWidth m.role.Width = cont.imageWidth m.posterImg.uri = cont.posterUrl m.posterImg.width = cont.imageWidth m.role.Text = cont.subTitle else m.role.text = "Who??" m.posterImg.uri = "pkg:/images/baseline_person_white_48dp.png" end if end sub
